definition: a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
details:
noun
- a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
= example: a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
- a white powdered poisonous trioxide of arsenic
= synonyms: arsenic trioxide, arsenous anhydride, arsenous oxide, white arsenic, ratsbane
